); } else { console.log("NEITHER MATCH.") } } const RenderMainFileContentHelper = ({ files, post }) => { switch (files.length) { case 0: return null; break; case 1: return ( ); break; case 2: return ( ); break; case 3: return ( ); break; case 4: return ( ); break; case 5: return ( {renderGridImageOrVideo(files[0], false)} {renderGridImageOrVideo(files[1], false)} {renderGridImageOrVideo(files[2], true)} {renderGridImageOrVideo(files[3], true)} {renderGridImageOrVideo(files[4], true)} ); break; default: return null; break; } } const ViewPostFileContentHelper = ({ post, isPostPaneOpen, setPostPaneOpenState, user, userData }) => { return ( setPostPaneOpenState(false)}>
